profile.description: I have experience in software development, both backend and frontend. I have worked using the Scrum methodology, actively participating in the development cycle of various applications and systems, including the creation of new features, evolutionary maintenance, and improvements. Additionally, I have independently developed projects from scratch. My adaptability has been key to successfully integrating into different projects and teams.

description-job1.resp2: Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code following best practices.
description-job1.resp3: Testing of applications to ensure functionality and reliability.
description-job1.resp4: Integrate applications with databases and third-party APIs.
description-job1.resp5: Troubleshoot and debug software issues, providing timely resolution.
description-job1.resp6: Code reviews and constructive feedback to members.
